nodes.text: In 12 ABY, during the Orinda campaign, the Traval-Pacor system played host to a battle between the Imperial Remnant and the New Republic. Head of State Gilad Pellaeon commanded the Remnant forces from the Executor-class Star Dreadnought Reaper, which was supported by Turr Phennir and the 181st Imperial Fighter Group. They were defeated by the Lusankya, commanded by General Wedge Antilles, and Tycho Celchu's Rogue Squadron. The Imperials retreated, and further showdowns awaited.
